front.title: Digital Identity Management for AI Agent Communication Protocols

abstract.t: AI agents are rapidly and massively transitioning from cutting-edge technology into real life. The AI agent communication protocol will establishing a critical means to connect agents with different users, tools, and other agents. Among all the features of AI agent communication protocol, digital identity is one of the most important components. Developing a cross-industry, universal, flexible, interoperable, and secure AI agent digital identity protocol is the foundation for achieving communication between agents and other entities in future network.
